events.title: Spanish Civil War Begins
events.description: The Spanish Civil War begins, serving as a testing ground for Nazi and Fascist military tactics.

events.title: Anschluss - Austria Annexed
events.description: Nazi Germany annexes Austria into the Third Reich.

events.title: Kristallnacht
events.description: Night of Broken Glass - violent pogroms against Jews throughout Nazi Germany.

events.title: Invasion of Poland
events.description: Germany invades Poland, marking the beginning of World War II in Europe.

events.title: Dunkirk Evacuation
events.description: Allied troops begin evacuation from Dunkirk, France.

events.title: Battle of Britain
events.description: Germany begins bombing Britain in preparation for invasion.

events.title: Operation Barbarossa
events.description: Germany invades the Soviet Union in the largest military operation in history.

events.title: Attack on Pearl Harbor
events.description: Japan launches surprise attack on Pearl Harbor, bringing the US into WWII.

events.title: Battle of Stalingrad
events.description: One of the deadliest battles in history begins.

events.title: D-Day Normandy
events.description: Allied forces land on the beaches of Normandy, France.

events.title: Fall of Berlin
events.description: Soviet forces capture Berlin, ending the war in Europe.

events.title: Atomic Bombing of Hiroshima
events.description: First atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima, Japan.

events.title: Japan Surrenders
events.description: Japan formally surrenders, ending World War II.
